ygData.subject: Re: Nagafen Problems
ygData.msgSnippet: This has happened to me and my friend that fight together. Both are lvl 20 Druids and fighting crag spiders in E. Karana.  Had to camp to fix it. BUT it was
ygData.messageBody:
This has happened to me and my friend that fight together. Both are lvl
20 Druids and fighting crag spiders in E. Karana. Had to camp to fix it.
BUT it was happening to lots of people in the zone. I knew to camp because
people where yelling that this would fix it. We both did a /bug. Last I
heard of it and it hasn't happened to us since. but my roommate ( who uses
my account for her char ) had this happen to her Saturday in Neriak ( SP? )
Forest but she didn't know the /bug command.

Logan
lvl 20 druid
Sol Ro Server
